title: OUR PROVEN PROCESS
subtitle: Four steps backed by data and optimized for maximum ROI.

steps.title: 1 - RESEARCH
steps.description: We find and study the top creators/best performing content in your niche on social media.

steps.title: 2 - SCRIPT
steps.description: Using the research and information on you and your business. We script an entire month of short form content.

steps.title: 3 - FILM & EDIT
steps.description: You film the scripts. We edit the videos.

steps.title: 4 - UPLOAD
steps.description: We upload the content on your chosen social media channels (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Youtube, Linkedin).
